#include<iostream>
using namespace std;int x[1<<23],p,q,n,i,j;main(){for(i=0;i<1000;i++){for(j=0;j<1000;j++){x[i*i+j*j]++;}}cin>>n;for(i=0;i<n;i++){cin>>p>>q;int r=p*p+q*q,s=0;for (j=1;j<=r;j++){if(r%j<1){s+=x[i]*x[r/i];}}if (s==8){cout<<'P'<<endl;}else {cout<<'C'<<endl;}}}

#define X r+=(m*p+n*q)%(m*m+n*n)==0&&(m*q-n*p)%(m*m+n*n)==0
#define Z if(X,n=-n)X,n=-n
main(T,p,q,m,n,r){for(scanf("%d",&T);T--;puts(r==8?"P":"C"))
for(scanf("%d%d",&p,&q),r=m=0;m*m<=p*p+q*q;m++)for(n=m?0:1;m*m+n*n<=p*p+q*q;n++){Z;if(m=-m){Z;m=-m;}}exit(0);}

def norm(m, n)
  m**2 + n**2
end

def isGaussPrime(real, imaginary)
  real, imaginary = real.abs, imaginary.abs
  if real == 0
    return imaginary&3 == 3 && isPrime(imaginary)
  end
  if imaginary == 0
    return real&3 == 3 && isPrime(real)
  end
  isPrime(norm(real, imaginary))
end

def isPrime(n)
  return n == 2 if n&1 == 0
  for i in 3...n do
    return false if n % i == 0
  end
  n != 1
end

gets.to_i.times do
  m, n = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  puts isGaussPrime(m, n) ? "P" : "C"
end

n = gets.to_i
n.times do
    p, q = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    ss = p * p + q * q
    count = 0
    done = Array.new
    2.upto(ss) do |s|
        0.upto(Math.sqrt(s)) do |u|
            v = Math.sqrt(s - u**2).to_i
            next if u**2 + v**2 != s
            if (p * u + q * v) % s == 0 && (q * u - p * v) % s == 0
                if !done.include?([u,v])
                    done.push([u,v])
                    count += 1
                end
            end
            u = -u
            if (p * u + q * v) % s == 0 && (q * u - p * v) % s == 0
                if !done.include?([u,v])
                    done.push([u,v])
                    count += 1
                end
            end
            v = -v
            if (p * u + q * v) % s == 0 && (q * u - p * v) % s == 0
                if !done.include?([u,v])
                    done.push([u,v])
                    count += 1
                end
            end
            u = -u
            if (p * u + q * v) % s == 0 && (q * u - p * v) % s == 0
                if !done.include?([u,v])
                    done.push([u,v])
                    count += 1
                end
            end
        end
    end
    puts count == 4 ? "P" : "C"
end

n = gets.to_i
n.times do
    p, q = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
    count = 0
    -145.upto(145) do |i|
        -145.upto(145) do |j|
            next if i == 0 && j == 0
            count += 1 if (i * p + j * q) % (i * i + j * j) == 0 && (i * q - j * p) % (i * i + j * j) == 0
        end
    end
    puts count == 8 ? "P" : "C"
end

### main

nd = gets.to_i

nd.times do
  pn, qn = gets.split.map(&:to_i)
  #p [pn, qn]

  p2q2 = pn * pn + qn * qn

  count = 0
  m = 0
  while m * m <= p2q2
    n2 = p2q2 - m * m
    n = 0
    while n * n <= n2
      m2n2 = m * m + n * n
      if (m != 0 || n != 0) &&
         (m * pn + n * qn) % m2n2 == 0 && (m * qn - n * pn) % m2n2 == 0
        count += 1
      end
      
      n += 1
    end
    m += 1
  end

  puts (count <= 4 ? 'P' : 'C')
end

C = set([i*i+j*j for i in xrange(160) for j in xrange(160)])

N = int(raw_input())
for loop in xrange(N):
    m,n = map(int,raw_input().split())
    m,n = abs(m),abs(n)
    mn = m*m+n*n

    prime = True
    for x in xrange(1,max(m,n)):
        for y in xrange(x,max(m,n)):
            xy = x*x+y*y
            if mn%xy == 0 and mn/xy in C:
                print "C"
                prime = False
                break
        if not prime: break
    else:
        print "P"
